name: Entypo+
quote: each pictogram has been drawn for pixel perfection at a size of 20 x 20 pixels and with a very consistent style

name: Source Sans Pro
quote: a set of OpenType fonts that have been designed to work well in user interface (UI) environments

name: Source Code Pro
quote: a set of OpenType fonts that have been designed to work well in user interface (UI) environments

name: Calendas Plus
quote: a typeface with a classical air, great legibility and elegance, designed for work in small sizes. Its special characteristics derive from its calligraphic finishing

name: The Elements of Typographic Style
quote: typographic style and its accompanying attention to detail have been overlooked by website designers ... in years gone by this could have been put down to the technology, but now the web has caught up

name: Sass
quote: CSS with superpowers ... the most mature, stable, and powerful professional grade CSS extension language in the world

name: GitHub Pages
quote: Websites for you and your projects. Hosted directly from your GitHub repository. Just edit, push, and your changes are live

name: jQuery
quote: a fast, small, and feature-rich JavaScript library

name: kramdown
quote: a free MIT-licensed Ruby library for parsing and converting a superset of Markdown ... probably the fastest pure-Ruby Markdown converter available

name: Jekyll
quote: a simple, blog-aware, static site generator. It takes a template directory containing raw text files in various formats, runs it through a converter ... and spits out a complete, ready-to-publish static website

name: DEVONthink
quote: saves all your documents, keeps them organized, and recalls them whenever you need them

name: git
quote: a free and open source distributed version control system designed to handle everything from small to very large projects with speed and efficiency

name: Scrivener
quote: a powerful content-generation tool for writers that allows you to concentrate on composing and structuring long and difficult documents

name: Sublime Text
quote: a sophisticated text editor for code, markup and prose

name: Markdown
quote: allows you to write using an easy-to-read, easy-to-write plain text format, then convert it to structurally valid XHTML

name: Marked
quote: a previewer for Markdown files. Use it with your favorite text editor and it updates every time you save. With robust features for previewing, reviewing and exporting beautiful documents, you can work in plain text while reveling in rich formatting

name: Travis CI
quote: a hosted continuous integration service for open source and private projects

name: HTML-Proofer
quote: a set of tests to validate your HTML output. These tests check if your image references are legitimate, if they have alt tags, if your internal links are working, and so on
